name: Funky Forest Friends
description:
Rediscover the true meaning of friendship in this quirky adventure.

Venture into the unknown in order to reunite your scattered friends.
Heal, be healed, and most importantly, dance!

Powered entirely by procedural animation, enjoy the parkour-like experience of jumping from foothold to foothold as you explore unique environments.

Fullscreen for best experience.

Controls:

WASD or Right Click (Hold)- Movement

Tab - Pause, Audio settings


Entry for Brackeys Jam 2022 

Music and selected sounds by Olgsone.

Remainder by Datux.

Theme: You're Not Alone
